AdminUpdateUser 

Register a new user to an account 

Introduction

Pre conditions 

1. User does not have an active account 

Post condition 

1. User's information will be updated. 

Basic Course of Action 

1. Administrator visits profile page. 

2. Administrator add user's name 

3. Administrator adds user's address 

4. System verifies required fields. 

5. System accepts new information. 

6. user's information is updated. 

7. Use case ends.
